availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George E. Roe (Greenup County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky, attorney. Fleming County, Kentucky, native. Married to Ursula Howland Roe in Greenup County, Kentucky, on December 29, 1853. Father of Mary W. Roe, Benjamin E. Roe, Nancy Roe, and Alice J. Roe. Resident in Greenup County in 1850. Attorney in Greenup County in 1860. Employed E. Foster as a serving girl in Greenup County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, District 1, p. 239A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, Sub district 2, East Little Sandy, p. 8356.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, Greenupsburg, p. 33A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994036, Greenup County Marriages, p. 2.
"George Elliot Roe (1828-1886)," Find A Grave, Memorial #6428508, accessed May 5, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/6428508.
